## Checklist
<!-- Verify before requesting review -->

- [ ] Code follows project style and standards
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] No new linting errors
- [ ] Security scan passed
- [ ] Activity log updated
- [ ] Changelog updated (if user-facing)
- [ ] Proper branch name used (feat/, fix/, docs/, chore/)
- [ ] Commits reference issues where applicable

## Approvals Needed
<!-- Check which approvals are required based on CONTRIBUTING.md -->

- [ ] Product scope → CPO approval
- [ ] Technical/infrastructure → CTO approval
- [ ] Security-impacting → CISO approval
- [ ] Messaging/marketing → CMO approval
- [ ] Pricing/packaging → CRO approval
- [ ] Cross-functional/mission → CEO approval
